sentences.en: a film of oil on the surface of the water
sentences.cn: 水面上的一层油

sentences.en: a thriller filmed entirely on location in Washington
sentences.cn: 全部拍摄于华盛顿外景地的一部惊悚片

sentences.en: Has somebody helped himself to some film star's diamonds?
sentences.cn: 有人偷了某个影星的钻石了吗?

sentences.en: Have you seen any good films recently?
sentences.cn: 你最近看过什么好的影片吗？

sentences.en: He finally admitted that his film career was kaput.
sentences.cn: 他最终承认他的电影生涯走到尽头了。

sentences.en: He was found desperately trying to untangle several reels of film.
sentences.cn: 他被撞见拼命想要解开几盘缠在一起的胶卷。

sentences.en: His voice will be edited out of the final film.
sentences.cn: 电影的最终版本会剪掉他的声音。

sentences.en: His wartime exploits were later made into a film.
sentences.cn: 他在战争中的英勇行为后来被改编成一部电影。

sentences.en: I shot five rolls of film on vacation.
sentences.cn: 我在度假时拍了五卷胶卷。

sentences.en: Many cinema-goers were stunned by the film's violent and tragic end.
sentences.cn: 许多来看电影的人都被这部影片暴力而悲惨的结局所震惊。

sentences.en: Originally released in 1957, the film was remade as "The Magnificent Seven".
sentences.cn: 这部电影最早在1957年上映，后被翻拍为《七侠荡寇志》。

sentences.en: Sadly, the film is let down by an excessively simple plot.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，过于简单的情节使得这部电影令人失望。

sentences.en: She’s in South Africa filming a documentary for the BBC.
sentences.cn: 她在南非为英国广播公司拍摄一部纪录片。

sentences.en: Television cameras were invited in to film him at work.
sentences.cn: 电视台摄像师被请进来拍摄他工作的镜头。

sentences.en: The criticisms will not stop people flocking to see the film.
sentences.cn: 批评的声音不会阻止人们涌到影院观看这部电影。

sentences.en: The film opened to healthy box office receipts before rapidly falling off.
sentences.cn: 这部影片的票房收入开始的时候持续上涨，但是后来急剧下降。

sentences.en: The film starts off realistically and then develops into a ridiculous fantasy.
sentences.cn: 电影以写实开头，然后却发展成为荒诞的幻想。

sentences.en: The film takes no position on the politics of Northern Ireland.
sentences.cn: 这部电影未在北爱尔兰政治问题上选择站边。

sentences.en: The love scenes are sensitively filmed.
sentences.cn: 爱情戏拍得很细腻。

sentences.en: The surprise twists in the storyline are the film's greatest strength.
sentences.cn: 该影片最精彩之处就是剧情的曲折离奇。

sentences.en: Was he going to show the film? Was it in colour?
sentences.cn: 他会放那部电影吗？是彩色的吗？

trans.tran_en: a story that is told using sound and moving pictures, shown at a cinema or on television
a story that is told using sound and moving pictures, shown at a cinema or on television
to use a camera to record a story or real events so that it can be shown in the cinema or on television
